column2: This character has a creative soul that seeks to capture the essence of creation on parchment and canvas.
column3: Ce personnage a une ame creatrice qui cherche a capturer l'essence de la creation sur parchemin et toile.

column2: This character is known as an expert among minstrels.
column3: Ce personnage est connu comme un spécialiste parmi les ménestrels.

column2: This character has spent long hours practicing the art of writing.
column3: Ce personnage a passé de longues heures à pratiquer l'art de l'écriture.

column2: This character is not bound by honour.
column3: Ce personnage n'est pas lié par l'honneur.

column2: This character is the embodiment of chivalry.
column3: Ce personnage est l'incarnation de la chevalerie.

column2: This character is of considerable stature, taller than most.
This character is nimbler and quicker than most.
column3: Ce personnage est plus rapide et habile que bien d'autres.

column2: This character is sharp, possessing excellent senses and intuition.
column3: Ce personnage a une excellente intuition, et on peut difficilement le duper.

column2: This character has a pleasing voice that sounds like the singing of birds, or a choir of angels.
column3: Ce personnage a une voix plaisante, qui résonne comme le chant des oiseaux.

column2: This character speaks in an imposing tone that can persuade friends, frighten enemies, and inspire subordinates.
column3: Ce personnage possède une voix imposante, qui peut persuader les amis, terrifier les ennemis, et insipirer ses sujets.

column2: This character can naturally use both hands with equal skill. As a result, they are more efficient in whatever they do, whether it is swinging swords or writing letters.
column3: Ce personnage peut utiliser ses deux mains avec autant de talent.

column2: This character is better at using their left hand than their right hand. It offers them many advantages when dealing with others, but it is viewed as impious by religious authorities.
column3: Ce personnage est gaucher. Cela peut lui donner maints avantages, mais il souffre du regard des autres.

column2: This character was born with an oddly-shaped chin or jaw – perhaps it is too big, or too small. Hopefully, this facial feature won’t spread with interbreeding.
column3: Ce personnage est né avec un menton ou de la mâchoire à la forme étrange - peut-être qu'il est trop grand ou trop petit. Espérons que cette caractéristique du visage ne ??se propagera pas à ses descendants.

column2: This erratic character was born with a scatterbrained temperament. They tend to forget things easily, get distracted too easily, or both. This behavior may be endearing to some, but to others it is an annoyance.
column3: Ce personnage se laisse facilement distraire, et a tendance à oublier rapidement certaines choses.

column2: This character is hard of hearing, or, worse, cannot hear at all. Such a disability limits their ability to function.
column3: Ce personnage a beaucoup de mal à entendre, peut-être même complètement. Difficile pour lui de tenir ses fonctions dans ses conditions…

column2: This character has overcome their deafness by learning how to read lips.
column3: Ce personnage a surmonté sa surdité, et a appris à lire sur les lèvres.

column2: This character is more imaginative than most, able to concoct innovative solutions and come up with exceptional, unexpected ideas.
column3: Ce personnage est plus créatif que la moyenne, et a surement des idées inattendues.

column2: This character's voice is naturally soothing. While it is neither powerful nor melodious, its mildness can calm even the angriest of people, and slyly persuade even the most skeptical of men.
column3: Ce personnage a une voix douce. Il arrive à calmer même les plus agressifs interlocuteurs, et peut sournoisement persuader le plus sceptique.

column2: Whether because of their physical stature or just their typical complexion, this character has a striking posture and a commanding presence. To some, they are even terrifying at times.
column3: Ce personnage a une posture imposante, et une présence digne d'un commandant. Il peut paraitre effrayant à ses ennemis.

column2: This character is unusually fertile, and seems to be made for producing healthy heirs.
column3: Ce personnage est incroyablement fertile, et donnera certainement naissance à de nombreux héritiers.

column2: This character always wears the lateset fashion trends.
This character is respected by his subjects.
This character is on a mission in the unknown lands, far to the east of the Sea of Rhûn.
column3: Ce personnage est en mission dans les terres inconnues, à l'Est de la Mer de Rhûn.

column2: The Love of Amroth and Nimrodel
Amroth and Nimrodel are in love, but the Sylvan Elf refuses to marry the King of Lorien, as he can't promise her a life of peace.
column3: Amroth et Nimrodel s'aiment, mais l'elfe sylvain refuse d'épouser le Roi de la Lorien, tant que celui-ci ne peut lui promettre une vie de paix.

column2: The Journey of Amroth and Nimrodel
Amroth and Nimrodel have left Lorien, and opened a path that will lead to their loss, or to their happiness.
column3: Amroth et Nimrodel ont quittés la Lorien, et entamés un chemin qui les mènera à leurs pertes, ou à leur bonheur.

column2: This character lost his material form after the One Ring was cut from his finger at the Battle of the Last Alliance. If he regains this ring, he will be able to return to his full strength.
column3: Ce personnage a perdu sa forme corporelle lorsque l'Anneau Unique a été coupé de sa main, durant la Bataille de la Dernière Alliance. S'il retrouve l'Anneau, il sera alors capable de retrouver sa pleine puissance, et sa forme perdue.

column2: This character simply loves Nature in all forms.
This character seems to be able to communicate with animals.
This character knows well how to adress a crowd.
This character is friendly to elves.
This character is friendly to wizards.
This character is friendly to dwarves.
This character is friendly to hobbits.
Sauron has used the Palantír to drive this character mad with despair. Thus he will be unable to lead armies.
